wiki.content:
"Heavy Metal Lover" is a song by Lady Gaga off of her third album, Born This Way. An instrumental clip was used as an intro and/or outro throughout episodes 41-44 of Transmission Gagavision. The song was registered on BMI on June 3, 2011. In an interview with CKOI 96.9 radio, Gaga revealed the song title and that it was the last song recorded for the album. She also stated that it will be on the regular edition. During the Monster Ball on April 13, 2011, Gaga revealed to the audience a part of the lyrics (You've got to earn your leather in this part of town). 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
